name: Vans Old Skool
description: The Vans Old Skool is a timeless skate shoe known for its signature side stripe and durable construction.

name: Adidas Ultraboost
description: The Adidas Ultraboost offers unmatched comfort with its Boost cushioning and Primeknit upper, making it perfect for long runs.

name: Puma RS-X
description: Puma RS-X combines bold retro style with modern comfort, featuring a chunky sole and vibrant colors.
